parameters.name: TT_DATA
parameters.description: describes the type of individual data samples input to and output from the dds/mixer

parameters.name: TP_INPUT_WINDOW_VSIZE
parameters.description: describes the number of samples in the input/output window API or number of samples to process per iteration.

parameters.name: TP_MIXER_MODE
parameters.description: describes the mode of operation of the dds/mixer

parameters.name: TP_API
parameters.description: specifies if the input/output interface should be window-based or stream-based.

parameters.name: TP_SSR
parameters.description: specifies the super sample rate, ie how much data input/output in parallel for a single channel.

parameters.name: phaseInc
parameters.description: specifies the phase increment between samples.

parameters.name: initialPhaseOffset
parameters.description: specifies the initial value of the phase accumulator, creating a phase offset.
